function.name: get_xdr_risk_report
function.description:
get xdr risk report for date period
 return: XdrRiskReport

function.name: get_xdr_risk_statistics
function.description:
get xdr risk statistics for date period
 return: XdrRiskStatistics

function.name: get_xdr_response_status
function.description:
get xdr response status of risks for date period
 return: XdrResponseStatus

function.name: get_xdr_available_response_playbooks
function.description:
get xdr available response playbooks for the risk
 return: List[XdrRiskResponsePlaybook]

function.name: get_xdr_risk_detail
function.description:
get xdr risk detail information
 return: XdrRiskDetail

function.name: analyze_xdr_unusual_risk_factor
function.description:
analyze xdr unusual risk's factor for target date
 return: XdrUnusualRiskFactor

function.name: get_xdr_user_timeline_events
function.description:
Get XDR user events with user account in a timeline format.
 return: List[XdrTimelineEvent]

function.name: get_xdr_device_timeline_events
function.description:
Get XDR device events with IP in a timeline format.
 return: List[XdrTimelineEvent]

function.name: get_xdr_risk_impacted_assets
function.description:
get xdr risk impacted assets(users, devices)
 return: XdrRiskImpactedAssets

function.name: get_xdr_latest_news_clips
function.description:
get xdr latest news clips for date period
 return: XdrLatestNewsClips

function.name: get_xdr_ioc_impact_status
function.description:
get xdr IOCs for date period (IOC: Indicator Of Compromise)
 return: List[XdrIoc]

function.name: get_xdr_risk_score_of_users
function.description:
Get information about the user with the highest risk score, top 10 users with risk score. This ranking reflects only identified users.
 return: XdrUserRiskScores

function.name: get_xdr_risk_report_of_user
function.description:
Get risk report of user for date period.
 return: XdrRiskReport

function.name: get_xdr_network_event_report_of_user
function.description:
Get report of user's network events.
 return: XdrUserNetworkReport

function.name: get_xdr_risk_score_of_department
function.description:
Get information about the department with the highest risk score, top 10 departments with risk score.
 return: XdrDepartmentRiskScores

function.name: get_xdr_devices_by_department
function.description:
Get devices which is related to users in the department,
 return: List[XdrUserDeviceMapping]

department.description: name of department that the users belong to

function.name: get_xdr_risk_report_of_device
function.description:
Get risk report of device for date period,
 return: XdrRiskReport

function.name: get_xdr_users_by_device
function.description:
Get user information related to device.
 return: List[XdrUser]

function.name: get_xdr_threat_intelligence_contents_of_risk
function.description:
get xdr threat intelligence contents(iocs, news clips) of risk
 return: XdrThreatIntelligenceContents
